title: Sign Up Form
text: A sign-up form with real-time form validation built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Etch-A-Sketch
text: An Etch-A-Sketch-inspired drawing web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. You can draw, erase, clear the canvas, and more.

title: Calculator
text: A calculator web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
text: A web app where you play rock-paper-scissors against your computer.

title: Landing Page
text: My first page built with HTML and CSS after learning flexbox.

title: Balluvar
text: A bullet hell built with godot that I am currently working on.

title: Linear Algebra
text: A matrix class implementation in python only using native libraries. Includes RREF, nullspace, and solving systems of linear equations.

title: Lifese
text: A self-improvement discord bot that organizes your life and keeps you on track towards your goals.
